name: Beam Riders
description:
BeamRiders is a fun party game that supports 2 or 4 player simultaneously on the same keyboard!  This retro DOS game tests each players reflexes and will to survive. The last player alive on the game GRID wins the round. Who ever has the most wins is the champion ! The game play speed is adjustable to help beginner players get used to their controls. 

CONTROLS: The controls for 2 player are 8456 and ijkl. The 4 player controls are wasd, ijkl, 8456, and the arrow keys. The number of games to play is also adjustable, which allows fun tournament play. Enjoy this game retro DOS game that was inspired by the movie TRON,

Submission for https://itch.io/jam/dos-game-jam-2
